General.Name: Zhejiang Noblelift Equip
General.Description: Noblelift Intelligent Equipment Co.,Ltd. engages in the intelligent manufacturing equipment and smart logistics system businesses in China and internationally. The company provides automated three-dimensional warehousing, conveying and sorting, and logistics software systems, as well as unmanned handling robots and systems that offers shelves, stackers, multi-layer shuttle vehicles, conveyors, automatic sorting equipment, handheld terminal picking, electronic label picking, intelligent APS production scheduling systems, handling robots and their navigation systems, dispatching systems, WMS systems, and intelligent industrial robots. It is also involved in the research and development, manufacturing, sales, and related services of various logistics equipment, which provides light and small handling vehicles, motorized industrial vehicles, AGV forklifts, and other industrial vehicles. Noblelift Intelligent Equipment Co.,Ltd. was founded in 2000 and is headquartered in Changxing, China.
